attributes.action: Any person entering the UK should ensure that they have medical insurance
attributes.background: We do not need lots of new Laws about access to the NHS the only law we need is to ensure that anyone coming here has medical insurance, after all UK citizens need Medical insurance to visit many other Countries and it without they would not be allowed in or would not be treated

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170532
